thread.section_title: Ski.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ski.com | www.ski.com | 3 of 44
thread.title: Syracuse Engineer

author: Syracuse Engineer
title: Syracuse Engineer
text: We've used Ski.com in the past for group trips but this time my wife and I wanted to take a custom tour of the Canadian Rockies. We did lots of homework, then emailed Tracey at Ski.com with an outline of what we wanted. She got back to us within a couple of days with an almost identical plan (There was the substitution of a much higher rated hotel.) and a substantial savings.
